Show HN: Git based open directory of companies hiring
text: It's using a git repository for data + netlify-cms in open authoring mode (for anyone with a github account to be able to contribute). The companies for which known job board providers (greenhouse etc) exist, get their jobs referenced in an algolia search index; companies get a community profile page generated by a SSG. Every one is welcome to contribute a company, provider, edit etc. The project is served from https://joblist.today

title: Elevator Saga The elevator programming game
Tell HN: Desktop computing is embarrasingly bad
text:
We have 1B+ companies unable to deliver an application that would take probably a couple of dedicated engineers per platform. I mean if some random guy can make a native Spotify application in his spare time, I expect that highly paid master-programmers employed by Spotify and other big tech companies to have a much easier time.

Most of the applications we use are some electron bastardization that even in that easy-mode development situation might not work on Linux. Even then every application now is it's own closed ecosystem and there's essentially no protocols left.

Also desktop email clients that ship with Linux and Windows are totally embarrassing. Everyone uses email, yet these primary interfaces on anything other than OS X is barely usable.

It's funny how Telegram is able to provide a desktop client and a library so pretty much every platform has the default client and a native-toolkit application. Why can't Slack/Discord do this?

I use or have used most of the platforms quite intensely and really the situation is embarrassing. I know that if this post becomes popular I will be told by scores of my peers how:

1. Electron apps are actually great 2. Linux is irrelevant (why are so many applications bad on Windows then?) 3. It doesn't make financial sense to support Linux

And other stories as they say. When are these apologies going to stop?

Show HN: I made and automated my house stairs
text:
Hello all!

I wanted to create cool animations on my house stairs. To show you my work, I recorded a quick video demonstrating my use of Luos, led_strips, and load sensors.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MT_hdq4ZtUk

If you have any question, ask me (Nico1209) on Discord: https://discord.gg/BUcV9Wys3p

Source code, and hardware available here: https://github.com/nicolas-rabault/home_stairs

Ask HN: How to Shield from War Propaganda?
text:
After watching these I have some question: https://youtu.be/11e0KVwd73k

Need honest opinion on this. It's clear that all sides drive their own agenda, so how do we battle it to avoid over-polarization? It's easier than ever to make good fake shots. My biggest worry is that, this stops us from having a dialog, and we all lose.
